payload.root_cause: DNS spoofing or cache poisoning issue affecting the auth-service
payload.recommendation:
- Implement DNSSEC validation for all queries to prevent DNS spoofing (confidence: 0.9)
- Regularly monitor DNS server logs for suspicious activity and update DNS records accordingly (confidence: 0.8)
- Configure the resolver to use a more secure DNS protocol, such as DNS over TLS (DoT) or DNS over HTTPS (DoH) (confidence: 0.7)
